template.name: Human_Follower_3
template.parameter: int id, double _v, int p_f, int p_fw, int start_from, int path

location.name: running
location.label: Fp'==0 && F <= passout_th && F' == Fp*lambda*exp(-lambda*t) && tUpd<=Tpoll

location.name: busy
location.label: Fp'==0 && F <= passout_th && F' == Fp*lambda*exp(-lambda*t) && tUpd<=Tpoll

location.name: assisted_walk
location.label: Fp'==0 && F <= passout_th && F' == Fp*lambda*exp(-lambda*t) && tUpd<=Tpoll

location.name: carrying_l
location.label: Fp'==0 && F <= passout_th && F' == Fp*lambda*exp(-lambda*t) && tUpd<=Tpoll

location.name: harsh_w
location.label: Fp'==0 && F <= passout_th && F' == Fp*lambda*exp(-lambda*t) && tUpd<=Tpoll

transition.label: currH==id && !run && !harsh && !carrying && !assisted && freeWill>=freeWillTh
t = 0, freeWill = 0, Fp = F, tUpd=0, updateFreeWill()
currH==id && harsh && freeWill>=freeWillTh
t = 0, freeWill = 0, Fp = F, tUpd=0, updateFreeWill()
currH==id && harsh && freeWill>=freeWillTh
t = 0, freeWill = 0, Fp = F, tUpd=0, updateFreeWill()
currH==id && should_sit(id) && harsh && freeWill>=freeWillTh
t = 0, freeWill = 0, Fp = F, tUpd=0, updateFreeWill()
currH==id && harsh && !should_sit(id) && freeWill>=freeWillTh
t = 0, freeWill = 0, Fp = F, tUpd=0, updateFreeWill()
currH==id && run && !harsh && !carrying && !assisted && freeWill>=freeWillTh
t = 0, freeWill = 0, Fp = F, tUpd=0, updateFreeWill()
currH==id && !harsh && freeWill>=freeWillTh
t = 0, freeWill = 0, Fp = F, tUpd=0, updateFreeWill()
currH==id && !harsh && !should_sit(id) && freeWill>=freeWillTh
t = 0, freeWill = 0, Fp = F, tUpd=0, updateFreeWill()
currH==id && harsh && !run && !assisted && !carrying && freeWill>=freeWillTh
t = 0, freeWill = 0, Fp = F, tUpd=0, updateFreeWill()
currH==id && freeWill>=freeWillTh
t = 0, freeWill = 0, Fp = F, tUpd=0, updateFreeWill()
t = 0, Fp=F, tUpd=0, sat_once = true, updateFreeWill()
obey

template.name: Human_Applicant
template.parameter: int id, double v, int p_f, int p_fw, int p_dext, int path

location.name: h_idle
location.label: t' == 1 && tWH' ==0 && Fp' == 0 && F' == -Fp*mi*exp(-mi*t) && freeWill' == 0 && tUpd<=Tpoll

location.name: h_executing
location.label: t' == 1 && tWH' == p_dext && tWH <= tWHTh && Fp' == 0 && F <= passout_th && freeWill' == 0 && F' == Fp*lambda*exp(-lambda*t) && tUpd<=Tpoll

location.name: h_busy
location.label: t' == 1 && tWH' == 0 && Fp' == 0 && F <= passout_th && freeWill' == 0 && F' == Fp*lambda*exp(-lambda*t) && tUpd<=Tpoll

transition.label: tWH >= tWHTh
served[currH-1]= true, t = 0, exeMission = 0, Fp=F, tUpd=0, tWH=0,hExe=0

template.name: Human_Competitor
template.parameter: int id, double v, int p_f, int p_fw, int path

location.label: assunzione per semplificare: il primo che arriva quello capace di tornare indietro con il componente per primo (altrimenti dovrebbero esserci dei passaggi tipo "staffetta")

location.name: way_there
location.label: freeWill'==0 && Fp'==0 && F <= passout_th && F' == Fp*lambda*exp(-lambda*t) && tUpd<=Tpoll

location.name: way_back
location.label: Fp' == 0 && F <= passout_th && freeWill' == 0 && F' == Fp*lambda*exp(-lambda*t) && tUpd<=Tpoll

transition.label: tUpd>=Tpoll
checkFirst(), freeWill = random(freeWillRange), tUpd=0, updateP(), updateF(-lambda, 1)

template.name: Human_Follower
template.parameter: int id, double _v, int p_f, int p_fw, int start_from, int path

location.name: busy
location.label: freeWill'==0 && Fp'==0 && F <= passout_th && F' == Fp*lambda*exp(-lambda*t) && tUpd<=Tpoll

transition.label: served[id-1] || (!served[id-1] && freeWill>=freeWillTh)
free_stop!
t = 0, freeWill = 0, Fp = F, tUpd=0, updateFreeWill()

template.name: Human_Leader
template.parameter: int id, double _v, int p_f, int p_fw, int start_from, int path

location.name: busy
location.label: Fp' == 0 && F <= passout_th && freeWill' == 0 && freeWill<= freeWillTh && F' == Fp*lambda*exp(-lambda*t) && tUpd<=Tpoll

template.name: Human_Recipient
template.parameter: int id, double _v, int p_f, int p_fw, int path

location.name: busy_mov
location.label: Fp' == 0 && freeWill' == 0 && freeWill<=freeWillTh && F <= passout_th && F' == Fp*lambda*exp(-lambda*t) && tUpd<=Tpoll

transition.label: freeWill>=freeWillTh
free_stop!
t = 0, Fp = F, freeWill = 0, tUpd=0, updateFreeWill()

template.name: Human_Rescuer
template.parameter: int id, double v, int p_f, int p_fw, int p_dext, int path

location.name: exec
location.label: Fp' == 0 && F <= passout_th && freeWill' == 0 && F' == Fp*lambda*exp(-lambda*t) && tUpd<=Tpoll

location.name: moving
location.label: Fp' == 0 && F <= passout_th && freeWill' == 0 && F' == Fp*lambda*exp(-lambda*t) && tUpd<=Tpoll

transition.label: nearRobot
t = 0, tUpd=0, Fp=F, freeWill=0
//errore se metto && freeWill<=freeWillTh. general hybrid guard without urgent channel
tUpd>=Tpoll
updateF(-lambda, 1), checkRobot(), updateP(), tUpd=0, freeWill = random(freeWillRange)
freeWill>=freeWillTh && !served[id-1]
free_stop!
hExe = 0, Fp = F, tUpd=0, t = 0, freeWill=0, updateFreeWill()
human autonomously decides to leave --> insuccess

template.name: Robot
template.parameter: int id, double _v_max, double _a_max, double posX, double posY

template.name: Battery
Orchestrator
OpChk
template.parameter: int id, int T_int, int T_proc

transition.label: opchk_fail!
active_robot[id-1] is not set true because the synch messagge opchk_fail is not received by anyone

template.name: ROS_SensPub
template.parameter: int id, double l_avg, double l_dev
